thread.title: Beijing makes HIV/AIDS prevention first lesson in college (Beijing Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: Beijing makes HIV/AIDS prevention first lesson in college (Beijing Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Beijing makes HIV/AIDS prevention first lesson in college (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) For students admitted to seven universities in Beijing this year, the first lesson they were given this September was on HIV/AIDS . According to the Municipal Commission of Health and Family Planning ,
